page.title: 01LOCAL AREA
page.content: The area around Pennington has quite a lot of big,old houses.Newlands Manor is probably the largest.Much of its estate has been sold and new houses have been built. Several others have become nursing homes. It is a good place for growing flowers,fruit and vegetables.There are several farms and lots of nurseries.Efford,which is an Experimental Horticulture Station,covers a wide area.There is quite a large amount of open space like Pennington Common,Rooke's Gardens,Recreation Grounds and farmland.Most of the roads in this area are country lanes.There are no dual carriage ways. There are four schools in the area,one Primary serving the Milford-on-Sea area,one Infant,one Junior and one Secondary at Pennington.
